info.name: YouTube - Simple (DARK)
info.description: Notes: - If you use YouTube - Custom colors video progress bar , set the colour scheme to red. (It doesn't change any of the code, allowing other themes to change the code) - If you want to to use Open Sans you need to download it. DOWNLOAD HERE
info.additionalInfo:
UPDATES V1.7.5 (February 14th, 2017) : - Added a transition to "Up Next" and "Watch Later" badge. - Colour scheme now effects loading bar at the top of the screen. V1.7.4 (February 10th, 2017) : - Fixed "Add a public comment..." color to white. (From a dark grey) V1.7.3 (February 4th, 2017) : - Fixed "Add to" dropdown menu. (Cheers OZ007!) V1.7.2 (January 23rd, 2017) : - "Colour Scheme" now effects "CC", Volume, Annotations Switch and Autoplay Switch on the video player. - Changed the background colour of Theater Mode. V1.7.1 (January 18th, 2017) : - Users are able to choose between Default font(Roboto), Arial or Open Sans. Don't have Open Sans installed? Download Open Sans Don't have Roboto installed? Download Roboto V1.7 (January 18th, 2017) : - Users are able to change the colour of: > Video progress bar. > Selected page on left navigation. > Selected page on horizontal navigation (Home, Trending, Subscriptions). > Subscribe button. (If you want more colours, just tell me.) V1.6 (January 15th, 2017) : Sorry for not updating this in a while. - Fixed playlist. - Fixed icons not being white. - Removed Max channel width.
(If you want it back just ask and I'll do something about it.) - Changed the YouTube logo to the original but with a few filters.
(To make it look nice.) V1.5.2 (September 28th, 2016) : - Users are able to chose if they want the channel page to max width. V1.5 (September 27th, 2016) : - Starting to change Creator Studios. (There are some that are not updated yet). - Fixed Uploading page. - Fixed playlist. V1.4.1 (September 22nd, 2016) : - Hovering over description will change colour of links. - Hovering over featured videos will change the title color to blue. V1.4 (September 16th, 2016) : - Minor fixes to search page and Subscribe buttons. - Replaced "Upload" button with an arrow. Upon hovering over button. "Upload" will appear under. V1.3 (September 12th, 2016) : - Fixed border colours for channels. - Removed borders from comments. - Minor fixes to text colours. - Fixed profile drop-down (avatar top right). V1.2 (September 8th, 2016) : - Minor adjustments to homepage - Fixed channel width not applying to c/username - Changed YouTube logo. - Minor fixes to channels V1.1 (September 6th, 2016) : - Minor adjustments to text on homepage, watch page and channel page. - Fixed Channel front video background. V1.0 (September 6th, 2016) : - First release. ------------------------------------------------- My Discord
